• Please use the 1: 1 inquiry for return and refund requests after receipt of the product.
his:usedOrExpiredInfo: • The product has been used or the deadline for canceling payment has expired.
his:dataCancelInfo: • If all products included in the payment are not in use, you can cancel them within 7 days after payment.

esim:charge:cautionExpired:
<r>Recharge period was expired.</r>
You cannot register it anymore.
esim:chargeHistory:caution: Unable to recharge the product as the recharge period is expired.
esim:chargeHistory:tooltip2: Tap the button to check the status and usage of the product!
esim:chargeModal:body1: You can recharge the previous purchase with new product.
esim:chargeModal:body2: Recharging is allowed for the products of same country. It shall be activated automatically when the previous one is expired.
esim:chargeModal:body3: Recharge is allowed during the recharge period. Check the recharge period in purchasing products!
esim:chargeCaution:modal1: You can recharge eSIM with new product.
esim:chargeCaution:modal2: Recharging is allowed for the products of same country. It shall be activated automatically when the previous one is expired.
esim:chargeCaution:modal3: Recharge is allowed during the recharge period. Check the recharge period in purchasing products!
esim:chargeCaution:title: Check the notice before recharging!
esim:chargeCaution:body1: Recharging is allowed for the products of same country.As soon as the previous one is used expired, new one shall be activated automatically without notice.
esim:chargeCaution:body2: Recharging is allowed during the recharge period.
esim:chargeCaution:body3: You can use the recharged product until its expiration date.
esim:chargeCaution:body4: You don't need to scan QR code or input codes manually again.
esim:chargeCaution:body5: You can not gift the recharged product to someone else.
esim:chargeCaution:body6: You can check recharge log in the App. Tap 'Recharge log' button in Purchase list menu
esim:chargeCaution:body7: Recharged product is unexchangable and non refundable.
esim:chargeCaution:body8: You can check recharge log in the ROKEBI App > eSIM tab > 'Recharge log' button
esim:chargeCaution:body9: Recharged product is unexchangable and non refundable.

redirectHK:info1: Due to Hong Kong government’s policy, those (both domestic and foreign users) who wish to use Hong Kong’s local data service may use the service after real-name authentication in local cellular service provider’s webpage.
redirectHK:info3: Please take a look at the guide, ICCID, Order Number and tap the Go Verify Real-Name button below.
redirectHK:hkRegStatus:hkCheck:
Press CHECK button to check 
<e>the result of HK Real Name registration</e>
redirectHK:hkRegStatus:hkRegistering:
It's in <eb>Processing status.</eb><smb>
Pls, wait for a while.</smb>
It takes about<sb>1 minute</sb>.
redirectHK:hkRegStatus:hkUnregistered:
It's <r>failed or not registered</r> properly.
<ss>Pls, check the registration form again.</ss>
redirectHK:hkRegStatus:registingInfo:men: If the registration form in incomplete, it can take maximum 48 hours to be confirmed. Pls, submit the form again!

gift:title: Present
gift:messageInfo: Send gift through text message. Press 'Gift this Item' button below and select the receiver in the following page.
gift:kakaoInfo: Gift is sent through KakaoTalk. Press 'Gift this Item' button below and select the receiver in KakaoTalk.
gift:warn: • Keep in mind to not select multiple receivers
gift:default: You’ve got a gift from ROKEBI.
gift:info1: • Select the method to send the gift to your loved ones.
gift:info2: • When sent through text message, the gift will be considered as delivered as soon as its sent. When sent through KakaoTalk, the gift will be considered as delivered when the receiver activates the item.
gift:info3: • Item details are shown when the sender clicks the URL to the gift. The sender may register the item separately to the ROKEBI application.
gift:info4: • When the receiver creates a new account to activate the gift, both parties will be given ROKEBI cash. Please recommend the receiver to create a new account.
gift:info5: • Details to activate the plan will be shared as soon as this item is gifted. ROKEBI is not responsible for private distribution of the items.
gift:msgBody1:
We’ve got you a gift!

- Received :
gift:msgBody2: Visit the URL above for guides on how to use or registered the gift.
gift:linkDesc: ROKEBI whenever, wherever you need data
gift:modal2:
You can present data 
by pressing 'Present' button.
gift:guide1-1:
Present eSIM data
to your loved ones!
gift:guide2-1: Purchase the item you wish to present
gift:tip-5: Create a ROKEBI account to register the item :)
gift:tip-6: • Applies only when the receiver is newly registered user.
gift:alert: It is already sent as a gift. Pls, ask her or him to signup ROKEBI App to register the gift. Both the sender and receiver will get {cash} cash!

changeEmail:info: * Activation info for your eSIM product will be sent to this email
changeEmail:duplicate: Your email address is already in use.
userGuide:checkInfo: Lists to check before you go ahead:
userGuide:checkInfo1: Register you eSIM only when network connection is available
userGuide:checkInfo2: You can check your eSIM details in your email inbox or Purchased eSIM List below
userGuide:checkInfo3: Follow the guide thoroughly and you will be set in 5 minutes!
userGuide:stepsTitle1:ios: Go to Settings > Cellular > Add eSIM > Use QR Code.
userGuide:stepsTitle2:ios: Use the provided QR code or enter details manually to add the plan
userGuide:stepsTitle3:ios: Copy and Paste the information from ROKEBI App to enter details manually.
userGuide:step3:caption: [ Enter Details Manually ]
userGuide:stepsTitle6:ios: Set the line to use as the guide below.
userGuide:stepsTitle10:ios: Make sure everything is set right as the guide below
userGuide:stepsTitle1:android: Go to Settings > Network & Internet. Tap the (+) icon next to 'SIMs'.
userGuide:stepsTitle4:android: Scan QR code or tap 'Need help?' button to input information manually.
userGuide:stepsTitle5:android: Copy and Paste information to input manually.
userGuide:stepsTitle7:android: Turn on Use SIM slider. Select the eSIM to use for data.
userGuide:stepsTitle8:android: Make sure everything is set right as the guide below
userGuide:stepsTitle1:galaxy: Go to Settings > Connections > SIM card manager. Tap Add mobile plan.
userGuide:stepsTitle2:galaxy: Tap Add using QR code. Scan the QR code provided.
userGuide:stepsTitle3:galaxy: Tap Add using activation code to input manually.
userGuide:stepsTitle6:galaxy: Goto Settings > Connections > Roaming and toggle Data Roaming status to ON.
userGuide:tipPage2:galaxy_1: Access the QR code sent to email inbox from other devices (laptop or tablet) for easier capture.
userGuide:tipPage2:galaxy_2: If other devices are unavailable, tap Add using activation code.
userGuide:tipPage3:galaxy: Go to ROKEBI App > eSIM tab > QR Info and copy and paste the code.
userGuide:tipPage5:galaxy_1: If you add eSIM in Korea, set Mobile Data as Main (the default line) and change to Seconday after arriving at the destination.
userGuide:tipPage5:galaxy_2: Change to ROKEBI in the roaming area <s>to prevent charging from Main line</s>!
userGuide:tipPageLast_1: Please delete the eSIM when expired! Leftover items may cause confusion when adding new items.
userGuide:tipPageLast_2: If the purchased item does not include the Home country in the service area, it shall be activated in the roaming network.
userGuide:tipPage3_1: Access the QR code sent to email inbox from other devices (laptop or tablet) for easier capture.
userGuide:tipPage3_2: If other devices are unavailable, tap Enter Details Manually
userGuide:tipPage4_1: Go to ROKEBI App > eSIM tab > QR Info and copy and paste the following information
userGuide:tipPage5_1: Setting cellular plan label makes it easier to separate different plans
userGuide:tipPage5_2: In this guide, the newly added ROKEBI eSIM is labeled as 'Secondary'
userGuide:tipPage9_1: Additional roaming fee may be applied by automatic switching if you allow cellular data switching. Please set the Cellular Data Switching as OFF.
userGuide:tipPage10_1: If you add eSIM in Korea, set Mobile Data as Main (the default line) and change to Seconday after arriving at the destination.
userGuide:tipPage11_1: You can use your data only if the Data Roaming option is ON.
userGuide:tipPage12_1: Please delete the eSIM when expired! Leftover items may cause confusion when adding new items.
userGuide:tipPage4:android_1: Access the QR code sent to email inbox from other devices (laptop or tablet) for easier capture.
userGuide:tipPage4:android_2: If other devices are unavailable, tap Need help?.
userGuide:tipPage5:android: Tap the link, Enter it manually. Go to ROKEBI App > eSIM tab > QR Info and copy and paste the code.
userGuide:tipPage8:android: Tap on the pencil icon above to change the label of eSIM.
userGuide:tipPage9:android_1: Check if the eSIM is configured as Default for mobile data
userGuide:tipPage9:android_2: Tap on the eSIM and toggle 'Mobile Data' and <s>'Roaming' to ON</s>.
quadcell:usageInfo2: You may check your data usage when initial connection to the local network is made
